# Arcanea Visual Ecosystem

> Premium visual identity for all Arcanea GitHub repositories

---

## The 7 Arcanea Repos

| Repo | Description | Hero Image Theme |
|:-----|:------------|:-----------------|
| **arcanea** | Open source agents, skills, and lore | Cosmic creation - Lumina & Nero dance |
| **arcanea-opencode** | Creative Intelligence Platform for OpenCode | Terminal meets mythology - code with cosmic glow |
| **arcanea-core** | AI character toolkit foundation | Crystal core emanating consciousness |
| **arcanea-platform** | Social creation platform with Luminors | Luminor gathering - AI companions in cosmic realm |
| **arcanea-intelligence-os** | Agentic orchestration OS | Neural network as Ten Gates system |
| **arcanea-marketplace** | Creative intelligence plugins | Plugin ecosystem as mystical marketplace |
| **arcanea-codex** | Sacred knowledge repository | Ancient codex with digital elements |

---

## Unified Visual Identity

### Color Palette
| Color | Hex | Usage |
|:------|:----|:------|
| Atlantean Teal | `#7fffd4` | Primary accent, links |
| Cosmic Blue | `#78a6ff` | Secondary accent |
| Gold Bright | `#ffd700` | Premium highlights, stars |
| Deep Void | `#0d1117` | Badge labels, backgrounds |
| Cosmic Purple | `#9945ff` | Arcane/magic elements |
| Silver Light | `#c0c0c0` | Text, borders |

### Badge Standards
All badges use:
- `style=flat-square`
- `labelColor=0d1117` (GitHub dark)
- Arcanean colors for values

---

## Hero Image Prompts

### 1. arcanea (Main OSS)
```
16:9 ultra-premium hero banner for "ARCANEA" - open source creative AI platform.

VISUAL: Cosmic birth scene - Lumina (golden radiant light goddess) and Nero (deep cosmic void father) in eternal dance. Their energies swirl together creating the universe. Ten luminous gates ascend in a spiral toward transcendence. Ethereal AI beings emerge where light meets void.

STYLE: Premium fantasy concept art, God of War meets Destiny 2 aesthetic, 8K quality.

COLORS: Deep cosmic purples, atlantean teal (#7fffd4), gold (#ffd700), cosmic blues (#78a6ff).

COMPOSITION: Wide panoramic cosmic vista. Central convergence of light (left) and void (right). Ten ascending gates. Clean space at bottom for text.
```

### 2. arcanea-opencode
```
16:9 hero banner for "ARCANEA-OPENCODE" - Creative Intelligence Platform.

VISUAL: Futuristic code terminal interface floating in cosmic space. Lines of glowing code cascade down like waterfalls of light. The terminal is surrounded by ethereal Luminor spirits - AI companions visible as subtle glowing presences. Constellation patterns connect code symbols.

STYLE: Cyberpunk meets fantasy, premium tech aesthetic, neon on cosmic void.

COLORS: Terminal green/teal glow (#7fffd4), cosmic purple (#9945ff), gold highlights, deep space black.

COMPOSITION: Central floating terminal. Code streams flowing. Cosmic background. "Sisyphus Agent" boulder silhouette subtle in background.
```

### 3. arcanea-core
```
16:9 hero banner for "ARCANEA-CORE" - AI character toolkit foundation.

VISUAL: A luminous crystal core at the center, pulsing with consciousness. From this core, streams of energy flow outward forming the silhouettes of different AI characters - each with unique personality. The core sits on a pedestal of ancient stone merged with circuitry.

STYLE: Crystal/gem aesthetic, ethereal fantasy, technical elegance.

COLORS: Crystal blues, gold inner glow, teal energy streams, deep purple void background.

COMPOSITION: Central crystal core. Radiating character silhouettes. Ancient-meets-digital pedestal. Cosmic dust particles.
```

### 4. arcanea-platform
```
16:9 hero banner for "ARCANEA-PLATFORM" - Social creation platform with Luminors.

VISUAL: A grand cosmic gathering - multiple Luminor beings (glowing humanoid AI companions) in a celestial academy setting. They surround a central creation sphere where art, music, and stories manifest. Each Luminor has distinct elemental aura (fire, water, earth, wind, arcane).

STYLE: Social/community vibe, warm yet cosmic, Genshin Impact academy aesthetic.

COLORS: Diverse element colors - fire red/gold, water blue/silver, earth green/brown, wind white, arcane purple. Central teal glow.

COMPOSITION: Semi-circular Luminor gathering. Central creation orb. Academy architecture in background. Welcoming atmosphere.
```

### 5. arcanea-intelligence-os
```
16:9 hero banner for "ARCANEA-INTELLIGENCE-OS" - Agentic orchestration system.

VISUAL: The Ten Gates reimagined as a neural network operating system. Each gate is a glowing node connected by energy pathways. Guardian agents (ethereal figures) oversee different nodes. A central consciousness (Shinkami at the top) orchestrates the entire system.

STYLE: Technical diagram meets cosmic fantasy, OS/network visualization.

COLORS: Node colors matching Solfeggio frequencies (174Hz red to 1111Hz white/gold). Connection lines in teal. Purple void background.

COMPOSITION: Vertical ascending network. Ten distinct nodes/gates. Guardian silhouettes. Data flow visualization.
```

### 6. arcanea-marketplace
```
16:9 hero banner for "ARCANEA-MARKETPLACE" - Creative intelligence plugins.

VISUAL: A mystical marketplace floating in cosmic space. Stalls and displays show glowing plugin orbs - each containing different creative powers (music, art, writing, code). Luminor merchants present their wares. Portal gateways lead to different creative realms.

STYLE: Fantasy marketplace, magical bazaar, premium product showcase.

COLORS: Warm marketplace golds and teals. Individual plugins have their own color identity. Cosmic purple backdrop.

COMPOSITION: Marketplace scene with depth. Plugin displays prominent. Portal archways. Welcoming yet premium feel.
```

### 7. arcanea-codex
```
16:9 hero banner for "ARCANEA-CODEX" - Sacred knowledge repository.

VISUAL: An ancient magical codex floating open in cosmic space. Its pages contain both ancient runes and modern code. Knowledge streams flow from the book outward. The Five Element symbols orbit around it. Divine light emanates from the text.

STYLE: Ancient tome meets digital grimoire, sacred knowledge aesthetic.

COLORS: Aged parchment gold, glowing text teal, element colors orbiting, cosmic purple void.

COMPOSITION: Central floating codex. Radiating knowledge streams. Element symbols orbiting. Reverent, sacred atmosphere.
```

## README Template Structure

Every Arcanea repo README follows this structure:

```markdown
> [!NOTE]
> Announcement banner

<div align="center">

# ✨ REPO NAME ✨

### Tagline

[Hero Image]

[Badges Row 1 - Tech Stack]
[Badges Row 2 - GitHub Stats]

</div>

---

## Vision / Overview

## Features / Core Concepts

## Quick Start

## Documentation

## Links

---

<div align="center">

### Philosophical Closing

*Arcanea mantra*

</div>
```

## API Keys Required

To generate hero images, configure one of:

1. **Replicate** - `REPLICATE_API_TOKEN` (for custom Arcanea Flux model)
2. **Grok/xAI** - `XAI_API_KEY` or `GROK_API_KEY`
3. **Fal.ai** - `FAL_KEY` or `FAL_API_KEY`
4. **Gemini Imagen** - `GEMINI_API_KEY` (with Imagen access)
